  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1993</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Ozonloaget</string>
            <string language="en">the ozone layer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Ozon-Schicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la couche d'ozone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a camada de ozônio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lo strato di ozono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το στρώμα όζοντος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la capa de ozono</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hva er ozonlaget? Lær hva som skjer her, og hvordan forurensning påvirker prosessene.</string>
            <string language="en">What is the ozone layer? Learn what happens,and why polution affects the process.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">ozon</string>
            <string language="en">ozone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">ozon laget</string>
            <string language="en">ozone layer</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist die Ozon-Schicht? Erlernen Sie, was 
geschieht und warum polution den Prozeß beeinflußt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est la couche d'ozone ? Apprenez ce 
qui se produit, et pourquoi polution affecte le processus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é a camada de ozônio? Aprenda o que 
acontecem, e porque polution afeta o processo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è lo strato di ozono? Impari che 
cosa accade e perchè polution interessa il processo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιο είναι το στρώμα όζοντος; Μάθετε τι 
συμβαίνει, και γιατί το polution έχει επιπτώσεις στη 
διαδικασία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es la capa de ozono? Aprenda qué 
sucede, y porqué polution afecta el proceso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozon-Schicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'ozone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couche d'ozone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ozônio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">camada de ozônio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ozono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strato di ozono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όζον</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρώμα όζοντος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ozono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">capa de ozono</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
